title: After Taliban sweeps into power, Pakistan, India and China all face a risky new landscape
content:
1. After Taliban sweeps into power, Pakistan, India and China all face a risky new landscape  The Washington Post
  2. LIVE | WION - World is One | Afghanistan falls to the Taliban | Mass exodus underway in Kabul | News  WION
  3. What will an Afghanistan under the Taliban look like? Its rise to power in the '90s paints a grim picture  CNN
  4. We cannot abandon a new generation of Afghans to chaos  Financial Times
  5. Afghanistan Takeover by Taliban Worries Governments in the Region, Europe That Chaos Will Spread  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: タリバンが政権を取った後、パキスタン、インド、中国はそれぞれ危険な新しい状況に直面している。
塔利班上台后，巴基斯坦、印度和中国都面临着一个危险的新局面
